Tensor
A C++ expression template library for computations on N dimensional tensors

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename DT >
ftl::TensorInterface< TensorTraits< DT, CPU > >::TensorInterface ( size_type  rank)
inlineexplicit

Default constructor - sets the data to have no elements, the rank to the specified rank.

template<typename DT >
ftl::TensorInterface< TensorTraits< DT, CPU > >::TensorInterface ( dim_container &  dim_sizes,
data_container &  data 
)

Constructor using vectors to set the dimension sizes and the data of the tensor. Moves the data if the data are passed as rvalue references.

Parameters
dim_sizesThe sizes of each of the dimensions for the tensor.
dataThe data for the tensor.
template<typename DT >
ftl::TensorInterface< TensorTraits< DT, CPU > >::TensorInterface ( dim_container &&  dim_sizes,
data_container &&  data 
)

Constructor using vectors to set the dimension sizes and the data of the tensor. Moves the data if the data are passed as rvalue references.

Parameters
dim_sizesThe sizes of each of the dimensions for the tensor.
dataThe data for the tensor.
template<typename DT >
ftl::TensorInterface< TensorTraits< DT, CPU > >::TensorInterface ( std::initializer_list< size_type >  dim_sizes)

Constructor using an initializer list - sets the size of each of the dimensions to the values in the intializer_list and the total number of elements equal to the product of the dimension sizes.

Parameters
[in]dim_sizesThe list of dimension sizes where the nth element in the list sets the size of the nth dimension of the tensor.
template<typename DT >
template<typename Expression , typename Traits >
ftl::TensorInterface< TensorTraits< DT, CPU > >::TensorInterface ( const TensorExpression< Expression, Traits > &  expression)

Constructor for creation from a tensor expression – this is only used for simple expressions (which do not modify the rank and/or dimension sizes) – such as addition and subtraction. Rank modifying expressions– such as multiplication and slicing – have specialized constructors (to be implemented).

Parameters
[in]expressionThe expression instance to create the static tensor from
Template Parameters
ExpressionThe type of the expressionA
TraitsThe tensor traits of the expression
template<typename DT >
template<typename E , typename T >
ftl::TensorInterface< TensorTraits< DT, CPU > >::TensorInterface ( const TensorExpression< E, T > &  expression)

void ftl::TensorInterface< TensorTraits< DT, CPU > >::initialize ( const data_type  min,
const data_type  max 
)

Initializes each element of the tensor between a range using a uniform ditribution.

Parameters
[in]minThe minimum value of an element after the initialization
[in]maxThe max value of an element after the initialization
template<typename DT >
template<typename IF , typename... IR>
DT & ftl::TensorInterface< TensorTraits< DT, CPU > >::operator() ( IF  index_dim_one,
IR...  index_dim_other 
)

Gets the element at a given index for each dimension of a tensor – there is no bound checking as bound checking implementations will be provided through .at()

Parameters
[in]index_dim_oneThe index of the element in dimension 1
[in]index_dim_otherThe index of the element in the other dimensions
Template Parameters
IFThe type of the first index parameter
IRThe types of the rest of the index parameters
Returns
A reference to the element at the position given by the indices
template<typename DT >
template<typename IF , typename... IR>
DT ftl::TensorInterface< TensorTraits< DT, CPU > >::operator() ( IF  index_dim_one,
IR...  index_dim_other 
) const

Gets the element at a given index for each dimension of a tensor – there is no bound checking as bound checking implementations will be provided through .at()

Parameters
[in]index_dim_oneThe index of the element in dimension 1
[in]index_dim_otherThe index of the element in the other dimensions
Template Parameters
IFThe type of the first index parameter
IRThe types of the rest of the index parameters
Returns
The value of the element at the position given by the indices

Gets the size (total number of elements) of the tensor.

Returns
The total number of elements in the tensor.
template<typename DT >
size_t ftl::TensorInterface< TensorTraits< DT, CPU > >::size ( const int  dim) const
inline

Gets the size of a specific dimension of the tensor, if the requested dimension is invalid then 0 is returned.

Parameters
[in]dimThe dimension for which the size must be returned.
Returns
The number of elements in the requested dimension, if the dimension is a valid dimension for the tensor, otherwise 0 is returned.
